author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Implement ECAL-only local reconstruction workflows runnig over 2018D data, using the same sequences as the similar MC workflows (minus the MC-based validation):
  - **136.885511**: 2018D HLTPhysics dataset, ECAL-only running on CPU
  - **136.885512**: 2018D HLTPhysics dataset, ECAL-only running on GPU (currently a placeholder)
  - **136.888511**: 2018D JetHT dataset, ECAL-only running on CPU
  - **136.888512**: 2018D JetHT dataset, ECAL-only running on GPU (currently a placeholder)
title: Add ECAL-only workflows for 2018 data
